doc.str: Particular calixarenes method for production and use thereof
The present invention relates to calix[4]arenes which effectively bind alkali metal ions (Na.sup.+, K.sup.+) and transport them over phase boundaries, their preparation and use.

Arnaud-Neu, F. et al.; "Selective alkali-metal cation complexation by chemically modified calixarenes. Part 4.
